import React from "react"; import "./CampaignList.css"; const CampaignList = ({ campaigns, onUpdate, onDelete }) => ( {campaigns.map(c => ( ))}
Campaign Name Client Start Date Status Actions
{c.campaignName} {c.clientName} {c.startDate}
); export default CampaignList;
